Package dbAPI

Class Constraint

java.lang.Object
dbAPI.Constraint
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutoIncrementConstraint, CheckConstraint, DefaultConstraint, ForeignKeyConstraint, IndexConstraint, NotNullConstraint, PrimaryKeyConstraint, PrimaryKeyConstraint.BasicPrimaryKeyConstraint, UniqueConstraint
public abstract class Constraint
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a single column constraint in a table, immutable
